original_title: Hikkaduwa is my favourite movie shooting location: Actor Ryan Reynolds
original_body_lines: The Canadian-American-born actor Ryan Reynolds recently said that Hikkaduwa is his favorite movie shooting location of all time.
He said this during a program held on a London-based TV talk show on Saturday.
The actor spoke about his first movie, "Ordinary Magic 1993" which was filmed in Sri Lanka.
The video was posted on social media by a user named Aqeel Sirraj.
"My first movie that I started was in Sri Lanka; it is so exotic and opened my mind to new horizens," actor Ryan Reynolds said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
